dialog.title: Page Templates
dialog.name: Name:
dialog.operateGuideTip: Click in the area to the left of the template name to make a template visible or invisible.
dialog.addTip: Create a new template using the current page?
dialog.replaceTip: Do you want to change the template to look like the current page?
dialog.renameTip: Do you want to change the name of the current template?
dialog.renameTip1: This name is already in use in another template.
dialog.deleteTip: Do you want to delete the selected template?
dialog.deleteTip1: Deleting template will not delete the page from the current document but only remove the template.
